Summary: Bright oval object was present around 15-30 second's than vanished
divs: Sighting DetailsThis object was seen by my brother while checking out new property he had bought. He seen a bright ovel shaped object only 10 to 15 feet above ground and only 35 or so feet away from him. It hovered and kind of danced or moved around for 15 to 30 second's then just vanished. He was able to use hid cell phone to take a photo while it was there, then took a photo of the same spot after it vanished. Was to small to be any form of space craft. To be honest we have no idea what it was and am sending you photo's so you may be able to tall us what it was.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around August 28th 2012
